publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3804 Mike Pringle: Congratulations to Boroughmuir High School on Winning the Scottish Final of Young Consumer of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Boroughmuir High School from Edinburgh on winning the Scottish final of the Young Consumer of the Year competition 2009; notes the school’s proud record in the competition, having won the UK final in 2006 and finished as runner-up in 2008; further notes the excellent contributions of the other Scottish finalists, Dingwall Academy from Highland, Linlithgow Academy from West Lothian and Kyle Academy from South Ayrshire, and wishes the Boroughmuir team all the best as it represents Scotland at this year’s UK final.
S3M-3804 Congratulations to Boroughmuir High School on Winning the Scottish Final of Young Consumer of the Year (lodged on 25 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3804 Mike Pringle: Congratulations to Boroughmuir High School on Winning the Scottish Final of Young Consumer of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Boroughmuir High School from Edinburgh on winning the Scottish final of the Young Consumer of the Year competition 2009; notes the school’s proud record in the competition, having won the UK final in 2006 and finished as runner-up in 2008; further notes the excellent contributions of the other Scottish finalists, Dingwall Academy from Highland, Linlithgow Academy from West Lothian and Kyle Academy from South Ayrshire, and wishes the Boroughmuir team all the best as it represents Scotland at this year’s UK final. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell*

S3M-3804 Congratulations to Boroughmuir High School on Winning the Scottish Final of Young Consumer of the Year (lodged on 25 March 2009) Mary Mulligan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jamie McGrigor*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-3804 Congratulations to Boroughmuir High School on Winning the Scottish Final of Young Consumer of the Year (lodged on 25 March 2009) Jim Tolson*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3804 Congratulations to Boroughmuir High School on Winning the Scottish Final of Young Consumer of the Year (lodged on 25 March 2009) Dave Thompson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3804 Congratulations to Boroughmuir High School on Winning the Scottish Final of Young Consumer of the Year (lodged on 25 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
